title: Redwood National and State Parks: Teens
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Teens              Teens        Redwood Documentary Explorers       Redwood Documentary Camp OMSI       Documentary Explorers Camp introduces students to documentary filmmaking as a tool for experiencing, exploring, understanding, and appreciating the natural scientific world. The program encourages students to use documentary filmmaking as a scientific learning tool—a creative way to record what they have learned through positive collaboration, problem solving, and technological skill building.   Living on-location in Redwood National and State Parks, young adults have created some amazing documentaries. Check out their films.
